name: Bot Together
description:
You control two robots and have to collect batteries to fill up your battery pack.  But don't let the shovels hit you or it's over (restart with "up").

Controls: left and right with arrow keys you can split the robots with "up" and bring them together with "down".

This game was made using PICO-8 in roughly 1.5hours for the Mini Jame Gam #15.
